sn35.138:1.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.138:1.4: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha.
sn35.138:1.5: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.7: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.9: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.138:1.10: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya, api nu tumhākaṃ evamassa:
sn35.138:1.11: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn35.138:1.14: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn35.138:1.15: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhu na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha.
sn35.138:1.16: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.18: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.20: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
